clip.quote: Show up. Do the work. Be straight with your clients. And success will be inevitable.
clip.why_clipworthy: It's a simple yet powerful mantra that encapsulates a successful mindset.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to know the secret to inevitable success in real estate?

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK (0:00-0:08)": "Want to know the secret to inevitable success in real estate?",
    "SETUP (0:08-0:18)": "Meet Jay Cannone, a seasoned real estate expert. In today's market, standing out is crucial. Here's why you should care.",
    "INSIGHT (0:18-0:40)": "Jay shares his mantra: 'Show up. Do the work. Be straight with your clients. And success will be inevitable.' It's a simple yet powerful mindset.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION (0:40-0:52)": "This approach builds trust and loyalty. Apply it to your client interactions and watch your business grow.",
    "CTA (0:52-0:60)": "Ready to transform your real estate game? Start by being genuine. Share your thoughts below!"
  },

  "HASHTAGS": [
    "#RealEstateSuccess",
    "#ClientRelationships",
    "#PersonalBranding",
    "#RealEstateAdvice",
    "#SuccessMindset"
  ],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
```

clip.quote: Marketing is attracting. Selling is convincing.
clip.why_clipworthy: This challenges the traditional sales approach and emphasizes the power of attraction.
clip.suggested_hook: Are you attracting clients or just convincing them?

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Are you attracting clients or just convincing them?",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) In the world of real estate, Jay Cannone challenges the traditional sales approach. Why should you care? Because it could transform your business.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Jay shares, 'Marketing is attracting. Selling is convincing.' This mindset shift emphasizes the power of attraction over persuasion, urging agents to focus on building a brand that naturally draws clients in.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) By attracting clients, you create lasting relationships built on trust and interest, not just a one-time sale. Apply this by enhancing your personal brand and community involvement.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) So, how are you attracting clients today? Share your strategies in the comments or start a conversation with your team."
  },
  "CAPTION": "Are you attracting clients or just convincing them? Shift your mindset and transform your real estate business.",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateMarketing", "#ClientAttraction", "#PersonalBranding", "#RealEstateTips", "#MindsetShift"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
}
```
